plot: Members of three Commonwealth armies, an Aussie, a Canadian, and a New Zealander meet actor Leslie Howard who buys them a beer and makes them understand why they're fighting.
title: From the Four Corners
plot_es: Members of three Commonwealth armies, an Aussie, a Canadian, and a New Zealander meet actor Leslie Howard who buys them a beer and makes them understand why they're fighting.
plot_en: Members of three Commonwealth armies, an Aussie, a Canadian, and a New Zealander meet actor Leslie Howard who buys them a beer and makes them understand why they're fighting.

cast.role: Himself - Pvt. The Black Watch of Canada
cast.name: J. Johnston

cast.role: Himself - Pvt. 2nd New Zealand Expeditionary Force
cast.name: R. Gilbert
